title: Navigation Bar
description:
The Landing page navigation bar is created through a "div" that acts as the parent to encase all of the navigation buttons. Each navigation button is also encased in a "div" to group the image and the label.

A background overlay "div" was also placed to on top of the parent, to enhance the gradient and blurring effect of the navigation bar.

Three functions were created to catch the events in the navigation bar:

handleClick - for the click event of the navigation button's image and label.
handleHover - for the mouse enter/leave event of the navigation button's label.
handleSocMedClick - for the click event of the social media buttons that sends the user to the linked website.
